alert.note: Alert for Aitkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 27 at 3:51PM CDT until June 27 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL AITKIN COUNTY... At 350 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mille Lacs Band East Lake Area, or 15 miles southwest of Big Sandy Lake, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported quarter-size hail 4 miles ENE of Hassman at 349 PM. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... McGregor, Mille Lacs Band East Lake Area, Kimberly, Lawler, and Rice Lake Wildlife Refuge. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
